desc: Lottie Mutton offers an interesting and ever changing range of unusual, unique and stylish home accessories sourced from all over the world. Lottie Mutton also offer an extensive interior design service including curtain/blind making, re-upholstery and much more.

layout.text: Welcome to Our World of Colour

We specialise in hand-finished, interlined curtains made to measure. Each member of our team is an experienced interior designer who will work closely with you from start to finish. From the moment you decide to invest in a new look for your home, we’ll look after you with an unrivalled personal service and ensure that you receive a beautiful, perfectly designed scheme.
